mapper.sql: id, userId, prefix, fileName, thumbnail_prefix as thumbnailPrefix, thumbnail, tagId, createTime, lastModifyTime
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user_images where userId = #{userId} ORDER BY id limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT FROM user_images where userId = #{userId} AND thumbnail_prefix = #{prefix} and tagId = #{tagId} ORDER BY id desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_images (userId, prefix, fileName, tagId) VALUE (#{image.userId}, #{image.prefix}, #{image.fileName}, #{image.tagId})
